definition: falsification in writing/misrepresentation in written history/deliberate digression
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: He uses a great number of deliberate digressions in this article.
sentences.chinese: 他這篇文章大量使用了曲筆手法。

sentences.english: Only researching on the mistakes of historians' records of Xiaoru's martyrdom could the historical reality be represented.
sentences.chinese: 考證史家曲筆與錯誤之處，才能再現孝孺殉難的真相。
